lines.text: You figure on doing another column on me?
You're only worth a couple of lines now.
Well, don't write 'em! I've been risking my neck with this outfit.
I hope they pay you well.
A hundred bucks a show, and I've been saving every dime. I'm gonna drive with the big cars now, and what you wrote about me doesn't go with them. So I'm warning you. Lay off me in the future.

[Amused]
You're warning me?
You better listen to what I'm saying, or I'll knock that smile off your face!

[She laughs at him]
Knock it off.
[He slaps her]
That's just about what I expect from you.
The guys you run around with wouldn't do that, would they? Well, it's time somebody roughed you up a little! I can handle you, baby. You're just another dame to me!
[He grabs her suddenly, kisses her, and leaves for his car. She looks after him with a subtle smile indicating she enjoyed it]

[In awe of the Indianapolis track]
Mike, I've never seen anything like this. It's terrific!
So are you.
It's like the 4th of July, and a heavyweight fight, and the World Series all rolled into one... Now I can see it takes a certain kind of guy...

[after a brief pause]
... and that guy needs a certain kind of dame.
Mike, could we start all over?
Hey, baby, what we had never stopped.

[carrying Stanwyck in his arms]
All the soft spots aren't on the track.
Well, you keep your mind on the ones that are.
Give me six feet and I get through anywhere.
It's like the Fourth of July and the heavyweight fight and the World Series all rolled into one.

[Angry about a newspaper headline about him]
Did Regina Forbes tell you to print that?
Nobody tells me what to print. One of my reporters thought he recognized you. We checked up. You'll always be recognized. You were a war hero.

[after a spontaneous kiss]
What was that for?
I just wanted to do it.
You're some kind of guy!
Well, what can we do for you that already hasn't been done?
You can give your eyes a rest and answer a few questions.
All the soft spots aren't on the track.
Well, you keep your mind on the ones that are.
